document.full_text: lebron james scored nine of his 29 points in the fourth quarter and the heat tied the series at 1-1 with a victory over chicago wednesday night.
document.title: playoffs | heat 85, bulls 75: the heat surges late and gains a split in chicago
lines_and_colors: lebron james scored nine of his 29 points in the fourth quarter and the heat tied the series at 1-1 with a victory over chicago wednesday night.
